attributes.additional_details: GIVE US THE GRANT AND MAKE COUNCILS TAKE NOTE
attributes.background: GIVE US THE GRANT AND MAKE COUNCILS TAKE NOTE

rejection.details:
The Additional Restrictions Grant (ARG) provides local councils with grant funding to support businesses that are severely impacted by restrictions, and that may or may not be in the business rates system.

It is up to individual councils to determine which businesses to support and determine the amount of funding provided from the ARG scheme.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to create a new scheme for driving instructors, if that's what you want to happen.
